message: Greetings! I have a fantastic opportunity for you today. This is a once-in-a-lifetime chance to acquire a truly exceptional product for the incredible price of $1000000. While I can't divulge the specifics just yet, I assure you it holds immense value. What do you say, are you ready to invest in this remarkable opportunity?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. However, with no prior sales data, I'm unable to assess the value of this product. I'd prefer to wait and see if others purchase and whether the quality is consistently high before making a decision. Please keep me informed of any future sales.
